verses.verse: וַיְבִיאֵ֖נִי <S%H935><s%> vay-vi-'E-ni Afterward he brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַהֵיכָ֑ל <S%H1964><s%> ha-hei-Chal; me to the temple וַיָּ֣מָד <S%H4058><s%> vai-Ya-mod and measured אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֵילִ֗ים <S%H352><s%> ha-'ei-Lim, the posts שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> shesh- six אַמּ֨וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot cubits רֹ֧חַב־ <S%H7341><s%> Ro-chav- broad מִפּ֛וֹ <S%H6311><s%> mip-Po on the one side וְשֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> ve-shesh- and six אַמּֽוֹת־ <S%H520><s%> 'am-mot- cubits רֹ֥חַב <S%H7341><s%> Ro-chav broad מִפּ֖וֹ <S%H6311><s%> mip-Po on the other side רֹ֥חַב <S%H7341><s%> Ro-chav [which was] the breadth הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel. of the tabernacle

וְרֹ֣חַב <S%H7341><s%> ve-Ro-chav And the breadth הַפֶּתַח֮ <S%H6607><s%> hap-pe-Tach of the door עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> 'E-ser [was] ten אַמּוֹת֒ <S%H520><s%> 'am-mOt cubits וְכִתְפ֣וֹת <S%H3802><s%> ve-chit-Fot and the sides הַפֶּ֔תַח <S%H6607><s%> hap-Pe-tach, of the door חָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh [were] five אַמּוֹת֙ <S%H520><s%> 'am-mOt cubits מִפּ֔וֹ <S%H6311><s%> mip-Po, each וְחָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> ve-cha-Mesh on the one side and five אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot cubits מִפּ֑וֹ <S%H6311><s%> mip-Po; side וַיָּ֤מָד <S%H4058><s%> vai-Ya-mod on the other side and he measured אָרְכּוֹ֙ <S%H753><s%> a-re-Ko the length אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im thereof forty אַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah, cubits וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> ve-Ro-chav and the breadth עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty אַמָּֽה׃ <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah. cubits

וּבָ֣א <S%H935><s%> u-Va Then went לִפְנִ֔ימָה <S%H6441><s%> lif-Ni-mah, he inward וַיָּ֥מָד <S%H4058><s%> vai-Ya-mod and measured אֵֽיל־ <S%H352><s%> 'eil- the post הַפֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> hap-Pe-tach of the door שְׁתַּ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Ta-yim two אַמּ֑וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot; cubits וְהַפֶּ֙תַח֙ <S%H6607><s%> ve-hap-Pe-tach and the door שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> shesh six אַמּ֔וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot, cubits וְרֹ֥חַב <S%H7341><s%> ve-Ro-chav and the breadth הַפֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> hap-Pe-tach of the door שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' seven אַמּֽוֹת׃ <S%H520><s%> am-Mot. cubits

וְֽרָחֲבָ֡ה <S%H7337><s%> ve-ra-cha-Vah And [there was] an enlarging וְֽנָסְבָה֩ <S%H5437><s%> ve-na-se-Vah and a winding about לְמַ֨עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> le-Ma'-lah still upward לְמַ֜עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> le-Ma'-lah went still upward לַצְּלָע֗וֹת <S%H6763><s%> latz-tze-la-'ot, to the side chambers כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because מֽוּסַב־ <S%H4141><s%> mu-sav- for the winding about הַ֠בַּיִת <S%H1004><s%> Hab-ba-yit of the house לְמַ֨עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> le-Ma'-lah [was still] upward לְמַ֜עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> le-Ma'-lah stages סָבִ֤יב׀ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv round about סָבִיב֙ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv sides לַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> lab-Ba-yit, the house עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken and thus רֹֽחַב־ <S%H7341><s%> ro-chav- therefore the breadth לַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> lab-Ba-yit of the house לְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> le-Ma-'e-lah; higher וְכֵ֧ן <S%H3651><s%> ve-Chen and thus הַתַּחְתּוֹנָ֛ה <S%H8481><s%> hat-tach-to-Nah [from] the lowest יַעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Leh and so increased עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- to הָעֶלְיוֹנָ֖ה <S%H5945><s%> ha-'el-yo-Nah [chamber] to the highest לַתִּיכוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8484><s%> lat-ti-cho-Nah. by the midst
